name: Gopeed
subtitle: Gopeed Altstore source.
description: This is the Altstore source for Gopeed.

apps.name: Gopeed
apps.subtitle: A modern download manager
apps.versionDescription:
Features:
- feat: web http file server caching and gzip support
- feat: auto updater
- feat: improve http download retry strategy

Bug Fixes:
- fix: http download size exceeds file size
- fix: web auth priority when api token and basic auth coexist
- fix: can not open url encode torrent file path
- fix: path url encode filename parse
- fix: windows title bar theme switch
apps.localizedDescription: A modern download manager that supports (HTTP, BitTorrent, Magnet) protocol. Built with Golang and Flutter.

privacy.LSRequiresIPhoneOS: The guest app is requesting for this permission.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: The guest app is requesting for this permission.
